item.title: By: Joseph Scott
item.dc:creator: Joseph Scott
item.description: That would certainly be a possibility I suppose. I'd be inclined to believe that was their intent if it was made very clear where the original came from.
item.content:encoded: That would certainly be a possibility I suppose. I’d be inclined to believe that was their intent if it was made very clear where the original came from.

item.title: By: beoba
item.dc:creator: beoba
item.description:
Worthy of note is that they link to you at the bottom of the page.
Benefit of the doubt: Maybe they were just thinking of it as mirroring in case your post disappeared. I dunno.
item.content:encoded:
Worthy of note is that they link to you at the bottom of the page.

Benefit of the doubt: Maybe they were just thinking of it as mirroring in case your post disappeared. I dunno.
